get.description: List the operations for the provider

AuthoringStatus.description: The authoring status for a landing zone configuration.

values.name: Authoring
values.description: This is the default status when a create configuration request is made. In this state, the Landing Zone configuration can be updated.

values.name: ReadyForUse
values.description: This status is set when the configuration changes are complete and the configuration is ready for code generation

values.name: Disabled
values.description: This status is set when the landing zone configuration is no longer in use.

create.description: When set to false, this management group will not be created. The default value is false.

create.description: When set to false, this management group will not be created. The default value is false.

FirewallCreationOptions.description: The input values for creating or using an existing firewall resource.

values.name: None
values.description: Value when a firewall resource is not created.

values.name: Standard
values.description: Value when the firewall creation is based on the standard SKU.

values.name: Premium
values.description: Value when the firewall creation is based on the premium SKU.

GenerateLandingZoneRequest.description: The request to generate code for a landing zone.

infrastructureAsCodeOutputOptions.description: The export options available for code generation.

subscriptionBillingScope.description: The full resource ID of billing scope associated to the EA, MCA or MPA account you wish to create the subscription in.

existingTopLevelMgParentId.description: Optional parent for management group hierarchy, used as intermediate root management group parent, if specified. If empty, default will deploy beneath tenant toot management group.

deploymentPrefix.description: The prefix that will be added to all resources created by this deployment.

deploymentSuffix.description: The suffix that will be added to all resources created by this deployment.

topLevelMgDisplayName.description: The top level management group display name.

deploymentLocation.description: Location to run deployment(s) from the list of azure regions.

organization.description: The name of the country, region or agency the landing zone is being deployed for.

values.name: Bicep

ddosProtectionCreationOption.description: To deploy ddos, choose Yes, otherwise No. Select Existing to provide an existing ddos protection plan.

existingDdosProtectionId.description: The resource id of the ddos protection plan.

logAnalyticsWorkspaceCreationOption.description: To deploy log analytics workspace, choose Yes, otherwise No. Select UseExisting to provide an existing log analytics workspace.

existingLogAnalyticsWorkspaceId.description: The resource id of the log analytics workspace that was created to centralize log ingestion.

tags.description: Array of tag objects in format of {'name':'a tag name', 'value':'a tag value'}.

firewallCreationOption.description: To deploy firewall, choose the Standard/Premium based on the desired SKU. Choose None for no firewall and UseExisting for a pre existing one.

firewallSubnetCidrBlock.description: Azure firewall subnet. IPv4 CIDR block.

logRetentionInDays.description: Set how long logs are retained for, in days. Minimum length is 30 and maximum is 730

hubNetworkCidrBlock.description: The address space for the VNET. IPv4 CIDR block.

azureBastionCreationOption.description: To deploy the bastion service, choose Yes, otherwise No. Choose UseExisting for existing bastion service.

azureBastionSubnetCidrBlock.description: Azure bastion subnet. IP v4 CIDR block.
